snippet.title: Pajama Sam 3: You Are What You Eat from Your Head to Your Feet - Night Dive Studios Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available on Steam!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/292800

Pajama Sam is off on a nutritiously edible adventure!

Pajama Sam chases down some snickering cookies, only to find himself in the midst of a food squabble! The fats and the sweets are taking over Mop Top Island and an emergency peace conference has been called, but four of the delegates are missing! Now, it's your turn to spring into action to help Pajama Sam find the missing delegates, put a stop to the sticky quarrels, bring peace to Mop Top Island, and still make it home in time for dinner.


Visit Humongous Entertainment!
Website: www.Humongous.com
Facebook: www.Facebook.com/HumongousEnt
Pinterest: www.Pinterest.com/HumongousEnt
Twitter: @HumongousEnt
Instagram: Instagram.com/HumongousEnt


Visit Night Dive Studios!
www.nightdivestudios.com
https://www.facebook.com/NightDiveStu...
@NightDiveStudio

Trailer:
http://www.lockevincent.com 
@lockevincent
